actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Beam (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The prismatic dragon emits a beam of white light in a 30' line that is 5 ft. wide. All in line make a DC 12 Dex save taking 18 (4d8) radiant on a failed save or half damage if made.
